comment: Stop bringing older shows back. Yes it is nice every once in a while, but it's getting crazy. I think screenwriters have lost their creativity and they can't come up with anything new!!!
amr:
# ::snt Stop bringing older shows back. Yes it is nice every once in a while, but it's getting crazy. I think screenwriters have lost their creativity and they can't come up with anything new!!!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stop-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (b / bring-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (s2 / show-04
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (o / old)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more)))
                  :direction (b2 / back)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (n / nice-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / it)
                  :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG1 1
                        :ARG2 (w / while))
                  :mod (y2 / yes))
            :ARG2 (g / get-03
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (c2 / crazy-03
                        :ARG1 ii)))
      :snt3 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (l / lose-02
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (w2 / write-01
                                    :ARG2 (s3 / screenwriter)))
                        :ARG1 (c3 / creativity
                              :poss p))
                  :op2 (p2 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (c4 / come-up-11
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (a2 / anything
                                    :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01)))))))
